name: pdftron-820-pof
description: Proof of failure for pdftron webviewer 8.2.0 (#26850)

scripts.start: npm run copy-deps-win && concurrently --kill-others --names build,server "npm run build:watch" "es-dev-server --node-resolve --watch"
scripts.start-x: npm run copy-deps-win-x && concurrently --kill-others --names build,server "npm run build:watch" "es-dev-server --node-resolve --watch"

author: Simon Voges (simon.voges@guidecom.de)
